widget.name: Social Networks Widget
widget.description: Displays social networking links, such as RSS feeds, twitter, facebook, tumblr, etc. These icons can either be derived from a biography, in case of single user websites, or they can be entered directly into the widget.
widget.editform:
<%= form_tag(layout_page_section_widget_path(layout.guid, url_encode(page_layout.get_url_identifier()), layout_section.name, widget_instance.id), :method=>"put") do |form_tag|%> <%= render :partial=>"roxiware/shared/common_widget_layout_settings" %> <%= fields_for :params do |params| %> <% bio_param = widget_instance.get_param("biography_id") %>
<%= params.label :biography_id, "Default Biography", :title=>bio_param.param_description.description %><%= params.collection_select :biography_id, Roxiware::Person.all, :id, :full_name, {:title=>bio_param.param_description.description, :selected=>bio_param.conv_value}%>

<%= param_field(params, @widget_instance.get_param("rss_feed_source")) %> <% end %> <% end %> <%= fields_for :social_networks do |social_networks_fields| %> <%= param_fields(social_networks_fields, widget_instance.get_param("social_networks").h.values, :class=>"social_network_param") %> <% end %> <%= button_tag "Save", :id=>"save_button", :class=>"save_button", :type=>"button" %>
widget.preload: biography = Roxiware::Person.where(:id=>locals[:biography_id]).first locals[:networks] = {} locals[:social_networks].each do |network, param| locals[:networks][network.to_sym] = param.conv_value end if biography.present? && biography.get_param("social_networks").present? biography.get_param("social_networks").h.each do |network, network_id| if network_id.h.present? && network_id.h['uid'].present? locals[:networks][network.to_sym] = network_id.h['uid'].to_s if locals[:networks][network.to_sym].blank? end end end true
widget.render_view: <% networks.each do |network, network_id| %><% if network_id.present? %> <%= link_to "", social_network_url(network.to_s, network_id), {:target=>"_blank", :class=>"social_networks_icon", :id=>network} %><% end %><% end %><% if rss_feed_source != "none" %><% end %>
